scripts.start: pnpm run worker && pnpm run processor && pnpm run graphql && pnpm run metrics
scripts.schema:all: pnpm run schema:generate && pnpm run build && pnpm run hasura:regenerate
scripts.metadata:enjin-matrix: rm -rf typegen/enjin-matrix.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.matrix.blockchain.enjin.io --out typegen/enjin-matrix.jsonl
scripts.metadata:enjin-relay: rm -rf typegen/enjin-relay.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.relay.blockchain.enjin.io --out typegen/enjin-relay.jsonl
scripts.metadata:canary-matrix: rm -rf typegen/canary-matrix.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.matrix.canary.enjin.io --out typegen/canary-matrix.jsonl
scripts.metadata:canary-relay: rm -rf typegen/canary-relay.jsonl && pnpm exec squid-substrate-metadata-explorer --rpc wss://archive.relay.canary.enjin.io --out typegen/canary-relay.jsonl
scripts.metadata:matrix: pnpm run metadata:enjin-matrix && pnpm run metadata:canary-matrix
scripts.metadata:relay: pnpm run metadata:enjin-relay && pnpm run metadata:canary-relay
scripts.metadata:enjin: pnpm run metadata:enjin-matrix && pnpm run metadata:enjin-relay
scripts.metadata:canary: pnpm run metadata:canary-matrix && pnpm run metadata:canary-relay
scripts.metadata:all: pnpm run metadata:matrix && pnpm run metadata:relay
scripts.metadata:merge: rm -rf typegen/chain-specs.jsonl && cat typegen/enjin-matrix.jsonl typegen/canary-matrix.jsonl typegen/enjin-relay.jsonl typegen/canary-relay.jsonl > typegen/chain-specs.jsonl
scripts.metadata:init: pnpm run metadata:all && pnpm run metadata:merge && pnpm run metadata:typegen
scripts.ci:build: pnpm run papi:generate && tsc && pnpm run ci:sourcemaps
scripts.ci:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org enjin --project enjin-indexer ./lib && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org enjin --project enjin-indexer ./lib
